Package database

Class HelperQuery

java.lang.Object
database.HelperQuery
public class HelperQuery extends Object
Class that contains quality of life sql queries that are widely usable. Contains functions to create / execute prepared statements, reformatting strings, and populating combo boxes.

  • Method Details

    • createPreparedStatement

      public static void createPreparedStatement(Connection connection, String sqlStatement) throws SQLException
      Creates a PreparedStatement using the provided SQL statement and the database connection.
      Parameters:
      connection - The database connection.
      sqlStatement - The SQL statement to be prepared.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • getPreparedStatement

      public static PreparedStatement getPreparedStatement()
      Retrieves the previously created PreparedStatement.
      Returns:
      The PreparedStatement.

    • formatColumnNames

      public static String formatColumnNames(String columnName)
      Formats column names by adding spaces between camel-case words and replacing "Id" with "ID".
      Parameters:
      columnName - The original column name.
      Returns:
      The formatted column name.

    • removeClassPrefix

      public static String removeClassPrefix(String columnName, String className)
      Removes the prefix (class name) from a column name.
      Parameters:
      columnName - The original column name.
      className - The class name prefix.
      Returns:
      The column name without the prefix.

    • setComboBoxOptions

      public static void setComboBoxOptions(javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> comboBox, String sqlQuery)
      Sets options for a ComboBox based on a column from a database table.
      Parameters:
      comboBox - The ComboBox to be populated.
      sqlQuery - A query that selects a column from a table.

    • setAppointmentTypes

      public static void setAppointmentTypes(javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> comboBox)
      Populates ComboBox options in the report tab based on the selected radio button.
      Parameters:
      comboBox - The ComboBox to be populated.

    • setAppointmentContacts

      public static void setAppointmentContacts(javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> comboBox, Map<String,Integer> namesToIds)
      Sets options for ComboBox with appointment contacts based on the Contacts table in the database.
      Parameters:
      comboBox - The ComboBox to be populated.
      namesToIds - A map to store contact names to their corresponding IDs.
